The Elder Who Gave a Single Meal
“Having given up the appearance of a god,🔽I came here with my wife;
in the dispensation of the Buddha, the Best.
with a mind full of confidence.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the almsfood.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā ekāsanadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmai ekāsanadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: The Buddha’s instruction has been carried out.”🔽Thus the elder who was called the Single Meal Giver recited these verses.
The Elder Who Gave a Single Meal’s Birth Story is the second.
